ygData.subject: Q' about Netted/Mesh
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Brother s & Sisters, First of all I would like to say Thank you to the many people that take the time to answer Q s from new B players like myself, I hope
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Brother's & Sisters,
First of all I would like to say Thank you to the many people that take the time to answer Q's from new'B players like myself, I hope you know that the info you share is very appreciated!.
Now on to the Q's!
I have read many things about Netted/Mesh armor, and am planing to start "Questing" for some. What I need to know though is, is this armor somthing that I will actualy "make" (ex. making patch work armor out of hides) and if so, what do I need to do this? just a sewing kit, or do I need to use some of my traing ponits in a certain skill area?. I am now on the cusp of tenth LvL, Is that high enough to start hunting what ever creatures will "give" me netted/mesh?. Also, I am a Freeport monk, I hear much talk about the sewers of Qeynos (think that is the place) But nothing of were to hunt for the creatures I am looking for in my area. (Here is a VERY New'b Q, If i do need to go to Qeynos, how do i get there, by boat or try it overland?)
I thank you all in advance for your time.

Zarvitz, monk of the 9th circle.
"May Quellios guide your mind so that you may guide your fists"
